summary: Just a simple Khajiit companion I made. Probably overpowered...
descriptionHtml:
I  wanted to try do some mods to skyrim so I started with this. Uploaded to share it with friends and others.

He is a Khajiit currently staying in Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. He has thievesguild armor, two ebony daggers, ebony bow and arrows and a few skooma bottles. It\'s a companion version of my main skyrim character so he looks a bit weird. :) Anyway I hope you like it!
author: Blupparen
